channel.title: Base Source shared content?
channel.description: I was wondering if it would be possible to find out what base Source shared content the mod will be using since I also have FakeFactory's Cinematic mod which has heavily modified base Source shared content. He would let you use his content in your mod if you just notify/ask him. The mod features high-resolution improved skins, models and sounds for HL2, episode 1 and 2. The newest version is 9 but 8 is the most easily accessible from Filefront: [url='https://halflife2.filefront.com/file/FakeFactory_Cinematic_Mod_8_Part_1_5_Final;92000']https://halflife2.filefront.com/file/FakeFactory_Cinematic_Mod_8_Part_1_5_Final;92000[/url]

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
Raminator:

what the fuck happened to her hair

yea that’s what most of the people ask, it’s like a big russian hat, you know that hairy one anyways i bet they were not concentrating on her hair, rather on her nipples

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: NesKwik
item.description:
eternalness:

80% of all people who dowload FF get just because the jigglebone feature. I got it because I wanted HL2 to look really nice, but he changed the music so its more “cinematic”. The game doesn’t feel like HL2 without the original soundtrack.

lol jigglebones.

Read full topic

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
Repzik:

I always hated the majority of Half-Life 2 soundtrack.

How dare you? You’re the sort of person who would have vindicated Hitler because he made the streets a bit quieter at night.

I’m jesting with you, I love you really. Also I’ve had a few so don’t take the first part seriously… or the second part come to think of it.

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Gser:

I actually like the new soundtrack. The whole reason I downloaded it was because I wanted something new, not the same old HF2.

80% of all people who dowload FF get just because the jigglebone feature. I got it because I wanted HL2 to look really nice, but he changed the music so its more “cinematic”. The game doesn’t feel like HL2 without the original soundtrack.

No, it’s to see alyx with less clothes on… Perverts.

Read full topic

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
I always hated the majority of Half-Life 2 soundtrack. FF does add some higher resolution textures and cool soundtrack, but it’s ultimately not worth the harddrive space.

Now you up and made me want to go through Half-Life 2 again listening to “Dear Hearts and Gentle People”.

Read full topic

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
The new music does add atmostsphere and it does make scenes a lot more dramatic, but during the fight scenes Valves techno beats get me so pumped and make the battle feel really intense,.

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: Gser
item.description:
Keresh:

They are using some of the shared content but it doesn’t really matter. Oh and as far as I know you will still be able to use fakefactory’s textures but it will look out of place since most of the content is custom.

Sure it matters, and we won’t know if it will look out of place until we try it.

Patonki:

You should never use FF. Never.

Meh.

item.title: Base Source shared content?
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Umm yeah cool, but they are making their own textures, sounds and models. They are using some of the shared content but it doesn’t really matter. Oh and as far as I know you will still be able to use fakefactory’s textures but it will look out of place since most of the content is custom.

item.title: Base Source shared content?

item.description:
I was wondering if it would be possible to find out what base Source shared content the mod will be using since I also have FakeFactory’s Cinematic mod which has heavily modified base Source shared content. He would let you use his content in your mod if you just notify/ask him. The mod features high-resolution improved skins, models and sounds for HL2, episode 1 and 2.
The newest version is 9 but 8 is the most easily accessible from Filefront: https://halflife2.filefront.com/file/FakeFactory_Cinematic_Mod_8_Part_1_5_Final;92000
